summary: During the course of a day, a heroin addict overdoses in front of an upper-class couple, attempts to fool welfare by having his girlfriend fake a pregnancy, and frustrates the women in his life with his drug-induced impotence.
cast: Joe Dallesandro|Holly Woodlawn|Geri Miller|Andrea Feldman|John Putnam|Jane Forth|Bruce Pecheur|Diane Podel|Roberto D'Alessandro|Michael Sklar
title: Trash
